name.ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, beans, peas, potatoes, cauliflower), 1 onion (chopped), 2 tomatoes (chopped), 1 green chili (chopped), 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp cumin seeds, 1 tsp coriander powder, ½ tsp turmeric powder, ½ tsp red chili powder, ½ tsp garam masala, 2 tbsp oil, Salt to taste, Fresh cilantro for garnish.
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add cumin seeds and let them splutter.
Add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger-garlic paste, green chili, and tomatoes. Cook until the oil separates. Add turmeric, coriander powder, red chili powder, and salt. Stir well.
Add the mixed vegetables and sauté for a few minutes. Add a little water, cover, and cook until the vegetables are tender (about 10 minutes).
Sprinkle garam masala, mix well, and cook for another 2 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve hot with roti or rice.
